nodes.text: Jinsol was a member of the Rebel Alliance's 61st Mobile Infantry during the Galactic Civil War against the Galactic Empire. Following the Battle of Hoth in 3 ABY, the 61st were making repairs to their CR90 corvette, the Thunderstrike, on the planet Ankhural.

During their time there, a number of rebels—including Jinsol, Maediyu, and Twitch—were attacked, and Jinsol came out of the fight with a broken nose. Although the attackers could have been a low-level gang, the rebel Brand knew that Ankhural was crime-ridden and became convinced they were the "real powers in Ankhural" wanting the 61st to leave.
Jinsol appeared in the 2015 novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
